title: Come and work for BikeRadar! We’re hiring two new writers
content:
Want to work for BikeRadar? We’re hiring two new writers to share their knowledge and passion for cycling with our fast-growing audience.

If you love riding bikes, talking about bikes and writing about bikes then you’re in luck. We’re on the lookout for a digital writer and technical writer to join the team.

BikeRadar’s new digital writer will write about all things cycling – from road cycling to mountain biking, via gravel riding and commuting, offering buying advice, sharing riding tips and reacting to breaking news.

The digital writer will play a key role in creating and updating content across all areas of the site.

Applications for the digital writer role close on 31 January.

  • Digital writer – job description and how to apply

We’re also hiring a technical writer to produce market-leading reviews for BikeRadar and Mountain Biking UK magazine, helping our audience decide what’s really worth their money.

As part of our test team, you will work across Immediate Media’s portfolio of cycling publications.

You will write about the latest bikes and products in a range of formats, including group tests, reviews, first looks, news stories, workshop guides and technical features, for use both in print and online. If you’re obsessed with bike tech, this is the job for you.

Applications for the technical writer role close on 22 January.
